original: Bergqvist, Carl Severin (Seven), häradsskrivare, Åmål, f. 27/9/84 i Ör, Älvsb. L, av köpm. Carl B. o. Hanna Petterson. G. 15 m. Anna Johansson. Barn: Carl-Gösta f. 18, Sven-Erik 24. — Stud:ex. 05. E. o. lands-kont. i Älvsb. 1. 05, ord. där 10, här :-skriv, i Nordmarkis fögd. 16, i Vedbö fögd. 18, ’i Åmåls sed. 46. Ordf. i tax:n’d, huvudman i ÅmåLs Sparbank, led. av planteringsistyr. RVO.
translated: Bergqvist, Carl Severin (Seven), district clerk, Åmål, born on September 27, 1884 in Ör, Älvsborgs län, son of merchant Carl B. and Hanna Petterson. Married on May 15th to Anna Johansson. Children: Carl-Gösta, born in 1918, and Sven-Erik, born in 1924. He passed his studentexamen (university entrance exam) in 1905. He became an extra deputy county governor in Älvsborg in 1905, regular deputy in 1910, district clerk in Nordmarkis fögd in 1916, in Vedbö fögd in 1918, and in Åmåls sed in 1946. He was chairman of the tax council, head of Åmål's Savings Bank, and member of the planning committee. He received the Order of Vasa (RVO).
